$:/themes/jd/Alone/Stylesheet.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Alone/Stylesheet.title: $:/themes/jd/Alone/Stylesheet

$:/themes/jd/Alone/Background.title: $:/themes/jd/Alone/Background
$:/themes/jd/Alone/Background.creator: jd

$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu.creator: jd
$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu.text:
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="no">
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes">
<center class="tc-tiddler-frame tc-page-controls" style="
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: auto;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0 0 0.25em 0;
    margin: 0;
    z-index: 900;
;">{{||$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/pagecontrols}}</center>
</$set>
</$set>
$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu.title: $:/core/ui/TopBar/menu

$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/sidebar.text:
<$scrollable fallthrough="no" class="tc-sidebar-scrollable">
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="yes" default="yes" retain="yes" animate="yes">

<$transclude tiddler="$:/SiteTitle" mode="inline"/>

<$transclude tiddler="$:/SiteSubtitle" mode="inline"/>
{{||$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/pagecontrols}} <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBarLists" mode="inline"/>
$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/sidebar.title: $:/core/ui/PageTemplate/sidebar
$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/sidebar.creator: jd

$:/AdvancedSearch.text:
<$keyboard tag="div" style="width: 100%;" key="enter" actions=""" <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]prefix[.o ]][[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]prefix[.e ]title[.s]]" variable="stateChecker"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]removeprefix[.o ]]" variable="listItem"> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]removeprefix[.e ]]" variable="listItem"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]text[.s]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki"/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]get[text]]" variable="stateChecker"> <$list filter="[!prefix[.o]!prefix[.e]!prefix[.s]]" variable="checked"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="New Tiddler" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} $savetitle="$:/temp/lastCreated"/> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/lastCreated}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> """> <$keyboard tag="div" style="width: 100%;" key="escape" actions=""" <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=""/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> """>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" focus="true" class="hyakupa" placeholder="'esc' to close"/>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AdvancedSearch/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>
<>
<>
$:/AdvancedSearch.title: $:/AdvancedSearch
$:/AdvancedSearch.creator: jd

$:/themes/jd/Alone/AboveStory.creator: jd
$:/themes/jd/Alone/AboveStory.text:
<$transclude tiddler="$:/SiteTitle" mode="inline"/>

<$transclude tiddler="$:/SiteSubtitle" mode="inline"/>
$:/themes/jd/Alone/AboveStory.title: $:/themes/jd/Alone/AboveStory
